LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.label: 酒精成癮
LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.description: 長期過量的攝取酒精已經造成了神經系統的適應。\n\n如果沒有定期攝取合適劑量的酒精，戒斷反應就會開始。長時間的戒斷會迫使大腦適應並恢復到正常狀態，從而戒除酒精成癮。
LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.stages.withdrawal.label: 戒斷
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.label: 酒醉
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.description: 流淌在血液裡的酒精，使人快樂，但又讓人神志不清。
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.warm.label: 微醺
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.tipsy.label: 酒醉
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.drunk.label: 爛醉
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.hammered.label: 酩酊大醉
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.blackout.label: 不省人事
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.label: 酒精耐受
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.description: 對酒精的長期耐受性。耐受性越嚴重，想達到和之前同樣的效果所需要的酒精也就越多。
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.small-0.label: 輕微
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.small-1.label: 輕微
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.large.label: 強烈
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.massive.label: 極強
LanguageData.Hangover.label: 宿醉
LanguageData.Hangover.description: 一種令人不快的酒精中毒後的中樞神經系統功能紊亂狀態。
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.slight.label: 輕微宿醉
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.strong.label: 微醺
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.pounding.label: 酒醉
